page.title: 04Sennen Lifeguards.
page.content: On Friday 19th July the whole of Sennen school went down to the beach to talk to the lifeguards and to have a swim.We went to the lifeguards hut and they came out to meet us.We sat down on the sand and they introduced themselves.One lifeguard showed us the equipment they use and also a thing called a torpedo.It was to help people to float if they were in the water.Two of the lifeguards went down to the sea to give us a demonstration .One man swam out and pretended to be drowning. The other one got a surfboard and went out and saved him.The next time they went out in their motor powered dinghy and did another rescue.We said goodbye and all went for a swim.After our visit we shall all be very careful when we go to the beach.
